name: Fashion Dress Up - Girl Games
description:
10 FASHION AND DRESS UP GAMES IN 1 APP!

New cool and high quality app for everyone who love fashion makeover, makeup and dress up games. There are 10 fashion games for every taste. Hundreds of clothes items, hairstyles, accessories and makeup options! If you love high fashion, top models and beauty games, this app is what you were looking for. Pick up outfits for fashion show models, red carpet celebrities, rich and popular girls, rising stars and more. Let’s open fashion model world and upgrade your stylist abilities right now!

Here you can dress up girls for every occasion. Create outfits for fashion show models or dress up rich girls who love to travel and buy clothes in local boutiques of world fashion capitals. Pick up clothes for celebrities and popular girls on a red carpet or choose wedding dresses for model marriage and much more. So many contexts for every fashionista’s taste!

• Ten model dress up games
• 50+ girls for every taste to choose from
• Thousands clothes items shoes and accessories
• Different styling contexts from fashion carpet to fashion trip
• Various face customization (hairstyles, jewelries and makeup options)
• Save your outfits in the photo gallery on your phone and share with your friends
• User friendly gameplay and high quality art

HOW TO PLAY

Choose any game you want to play and download it on your smartphone. Then pick up a girl you like the most and start her fashion makeover. Choose the background and appropriate clothes, pick up perfect hairstyle and accessories. In some games you’ll have ability to choose makeup or facial features like eyes, eyebrows, blush and lips. As soon as you finish girls makeover take a picture of your top models and their stylish outfits and share with your friends! Show them your fashion stylist skills and test their abilities. Start your local fashion designer competition and choose the best one!
